Well, first Megs said that as far as he knew, he was the only 
Decepticon on the planet (I think he said that, or I misread or 
something), and then he said he had troops working on something. Those 
troops could be non-Decepticon, so that's why I said "kind of" after 
the contradicting thing.

::Autofire::

Autofire climbs into the pod behind Megatron, powering it up. The pod 
slowly rises into the air.

"Allright, where's a recharge spot that you can use?" Autofire asks 
Megatron, blasting a large sized hole in the wall using the pod's 
weapons and flying the pod out of it. As they leave the cave, the 
weapons aim backwards, firing and causing the cave to cave in again.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Yo Yan, could you tell me what I said that contradicted what I said
